entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #465
entry.content: I already have trouble going to social events and suddenly I am asked to throw out my concept of a date..

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #464
entry.content: And I don’t know if I’m overthinking it. But it made me quite uncomfortable.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #463
entry.content:
Today I figured out what a double date is. Seems like a scary experience. Especially when you don’t know the other people. Aren’t dates meant to be personal? If there’s more than two, wouldn’t it be just a meet-up sort of thing?

Now I am just really anxious about that topic.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #428
entry.content: Having to re-learn all emotions when you forgot how to feel is quite a heavy task.. but I’m managing.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #427
entry.content: It’s just so,, weird, the feeling of content. It’s a new emotion I’ve never really felt before.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #426
entry.content: Anyhow, I’ve been doing a lot better compared to earlier this year. And to go even further back I was in an even worse condition. Overall, although there’s still many things I dislike, hate or want to change, my life is doing better.

entry.content: My girlfriend makes me feel all warm inside

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #405
entry.content: I’ve never eaten much fast food or such, so going to a McDonalds feels so alien after barely going to one. You don’t need to even interact with any workers in order to order a hamburger, it’s all done via huge screens. Also, I now remember why I don’t go to fast food places, the food is subpar.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #390

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #389
entry.content: I don’t want to be throned, neither do I want to be forgotten.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #388
entry.content: These questions are a few of many that I have.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #387
entry.content: If I ever decided to depart, I wouldn’t notify others as I know the pain that can cause. Though, it would probably get noticed quickly in active communities im in and my stop of GitHub commits

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #385
entry.content: In the grand scheme of things, you wouldn’t really even exist

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #384
entry.content: Would I have a legacy to be looked at if I just suddenly passed? I haven’t really achieved anything in particular that makes me memorable.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #383
entry.content: Having my sisters hurt makes me feel worse about myself, like if they don’t think they’re light at the end of the tunnel, why should I?

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #382
entry.content: And I am unsure if they're OK.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #381
entry.content: I still feel so, powerless. I can't control what they do.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #380

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #373
entry.content: Which might be the reason I listen to a lot of what people call "trash music". As I've never consumed much of that when I were younger.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #372
entry.content: I grew up with classical music, beautiful architecture, a complete different culture from the cities and such. It took me a very long time to get used to pop music.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #371
entry.content: I've considered talking to the pastor of the church I went to, but then I remember he looked the other way when I was being abused by others.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #370
entry.content: I struggle to talk with others about it, as most of my sisters have grown up atheist or more progressive-protestant Christian, which is so different from Roman-Catholicism.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #368
entry.content: That's not the way God intended it to be. I've considered myself more-so churchless.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #367
entry.content: How can you love a religion when said religion doesn't love you back?

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #366
entry.content: I wouldn't call myself Ex- or Atheist, but neither am I as religious.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #365
entry.content: Like other's have said before, it's the indoctrination that makes you have stockholm syndrome as a way of damage control.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #364
entry.content: I used to be a devoted Roman-Catholic, attending church, being an altarboy, help with church events, trips, etc.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #363
entry.content: As for religion, I still struggle with my religious upbringing. I've missed out on a lot of things non-religious people have experienced.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #362
entry.content: I’ve also been excited about visiting my girlfriend’s place in person!! Although her mother doesn’t seem to be of the supportive kind, im sure we will have a great time together.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #274

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #179
entry.content:
I used to know a kid back in highschool, he got from a rough place and managed to leave highschool early to pursue his career in music and beat making. Years ago when I last saw him he decided to chat with me about life and such and showed that he’ll be travelling outside the country to work for a label or something and was proud of his gym progress getting jacked.

I sometimes wonder what happened to him, we never exchanged phone numbers nor were we really considered friends. I hope life is treating him well now and that he made his dreams come true.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #178
entry.content: I didn’t get into too much detail in my article about IPFS about how smart contracts works and such, but I hope to make a revised version.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #177
entry.content: A lot of people in the tech scene seem to be misinformed about “new” technology like cryptography and the impact it could have on the internet as whole once it’s fully ready to be used by the wider market. Web3 mostly gets a bad reputation because people think of the word “crypto” as “cryptocurrency” even though cryptocurrency does not play a role in this at all.

I hope to go to university soon.

I need some internship hours (mandatory) in order to graduate two years earlier than you're supposed to.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #107
entry.content: Talked with personal help assistant about how I grew up in an environment that was very toxic now that I think about it. If you didn’t fit in you would be excommunicated by both the parents and the children. You had to get 100/100’s at elementary school else you’d be a failure and you’d never have a future.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #76
entry.content:
I apologize for my frequent ramblings. I do not want to come over like this to others.

I have been making plan B's for continuing to live. It's not my top priority as plan A defeats plan B. I love all my friends.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #75
entry.content: As I've stated before, I do not want to reach my birthday. It's of no use, nothing to celebrate other than my misery. I hope to donate my savings and checking balances toward health organisations that might be able to make a change.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #74
entry.content: I know I will disappoint everyone around me for this. But I suppose I'll be selfish this time. Once I am ready, I will say a final goodnight.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #72
entry.content: I have been feeling very depressed lately. It's becoming a problem. Departing without anyone's consent might be the best option. I need to think of a good date when everyone is gone that I can go depart peacefully. I've considered a lot of options; drugs, auto-mutilation, or departing via train. It's all so exhausting.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #70
entry.content: Now it’s time to shower and off to bed

entry.content: Once again, I really hate needles. But it’s life saving…

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #67
entry.content: I managed to take care of myself today, I’m happy with that. I’ll be heading to bed now. Goodnight kind world.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #66
entry.content: I hope to work on my school and some blog articles the coming days.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #64
entry.content: Going to a hairdresser with my mom soon. I hope to get a nice haircut or such as a haircut makes all the difference. Last time (when I was growing out my hair) the barber messed up and gave me a very masculine cut. I cried my way home and at home itself. This was almost a year ago, I have been too afraid to get a haircut ever since then as it felt like my hair got assaulted. Will send an email to my clinic too. I keep forgetting to do so.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #63
entry.content: I cleaned my room. It frees up your mind.

entry.content: I will be heading to bed, goodnight.

entry.content:
Played a lot of videogames today with a friend. It was fun.

Still feeling really dysphoric on a daily basis. Why must I feel such a way constantly?

I hope to get in contact with my clinic soon. The doctors can fix you, they say.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #58
entry.content:
Goodnight kind and harsh world. I will stay ambivalent about you.

Goodnight to all my friends aswell. And goodnight everyone who have been suffering through the same pain.

entry.content: Transgender Healthcare sure has a long way to go. I wish we had informed consent like they have overseas.
